# OverDrive 2.6 Re-Release: Frequently Asked Questions {#overdrive-2.6-re-release-frequently-asked-questions .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

With the re-release of OverDrive 2.6, we at Digital Dream Labs aim to
provide the community with a return to what many refer to as the best
experience on OverDrive. We have updated the app to work on the latest
phones and keep those engines at redline!

#### Will this app be free?

OverDrive 2.6.4 will be a paid app at the price point of \$2.99 USD. We
believe that this is a fair price which covers our development costs for
updating the app and helps us to develop new OverDrive projects for you
to enjoy!

#### Do I have to buy the app on every device?

We believe you should play together! With Family Library (Google Play)
or Family Sharing (Apple Store) enabled, each family will only have to
pay for the app once on each platform. That is, if you want to play on
devices that connect to different App Stores (Google Play and Apple
Store, for example), you will have to purchase the app once on each app
store platform. Guest devices or devices that are outside of the Family
Library / Family Sharing plans will also need to purchase the app. See
\"How do I set up Family Library for Google Play or Family Sharing for
the Apple App Store?\" for instructions on enabling these great sharing
options!

#### How do I set up Family Library for Google Play or Family Sharing for the Apple App Store?

Check out the below links for instructions to set up Family Sharing on
each app store:\
[Android - Click here to learn how to set up Family Library for Google
Play](https://support.google.com/families/answer/7007852){target="_blank"}\
[Apple iPhone / iOS - Click here to learn how to set up Family Sharing
for App
Store](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201088){target="_blank"}

#### Does OverDrive 2.6 support cars from the OverDrive: Fast & Furious Edition?

Yes! OverDrive 2.6 now supports \"Mammoth\" and \"Dynamo\" cars, which
are cars renamed from the Fast & Furious edition due to licensing
expirations.

**Please Note: OverDrive 2.6 does not support the Power Zone from the
Fast & Furious kit. The app will crash if the Power Zone is scanned;
please ensure that you do not use the Power Zone track piece while using
the OverDrive 2.6 app.**

#### Where do I send bug reports?

Please send reports of bugs or issues to
support@digitaldreamlabs.com. Thanks for being patient with us while we
work out the kinks!

#### 

####
